title: Meeting Ideas - Project Alpha
content:
Key discussion points for tomorrow's project kickoff:

1. Define project scope and deliverables
2. Establish timeline and milestones
3. Assign team roles and responsibilities
4. Set up communication channels
5. Budget allocation and resources

Remember to bring the wireframes and mockups to show the design direction.

title: Recipe - Homemade Pasta Sauce
content:
Ingredients:
- 2 cans crushed tomatoes
- 1 onion, diced
- 4 cloves garlic, minced
- 2 tbsp olive oil
- 1 tsp oregano
- 1 tsp basil
- Salt and pepper to taste

Instructions:
1. Heat olive oil in large pan
2. Saut√© onion until translucent
3. Add garlic, cook for 1 minute
4. Add tomatoes and seasonings
5. Simmer for 20 minutes

Notes: Add a pinch of sugar if too acidic. Fresh basil is amazing if available!

title: Book Recommendations from Sarah
content:
Sarah recommended these books during our coffee chat:

üìö Fiction:
- The Seven Husbands of Evelyn Hugo
- Where the Crawdads Sing
- The Midnight Library

üìö Non-Fiction:
- Atomic Habits by James Clear
- The Subtle Art of Not Giving a F*ck
- Educated by Tara Westover

She said the Midnight Library really made her think about life choices. Adding these to my reading list!

title: Workout Plan - January Goals
content:
January fitness goals:

üéØ Main objective: Build consistent exercise routine

Weekly plan:
- Monday: Upper body strength
- Tuesday: Cardio (30 min)
- Wednesday: Lower body strength
- Thursday: Yoga or stretching
- Friday: Full body workout
- Weekend: Hiking or outdoor activity

Progress tracking:
- Week 1: 3/5 workouts completed ‚úì
- Week 2: 4/5 workouts completed ‚úì
- Week 3: Target 5/5 workouts

Feeling stronger already! Need to focus on consistency over intensity.

title: Travel Ideas - Summer 2024
content:
Potential destinations for summer vacation:

üåç Europe Options:
- Iceland: Northern lights, Blue Lagoon, Ring Road
- Portugal: Lisbon, Porto, coastal towns
- Greece: Santorini, Mykonos, Athens

üèîÔ∏è Adventure Options:
- New Zealand: Hiking, Lord of the Rings locations
- Patagonia: Torres del Paine, glaciers
- Canadian Rockies: Banff, Jasper

üí∞ Budget considerations:
- Europe: $3000-4000
- Adventure trips: $2500-3500
- Need to book by March for best prices

Leaning towards Portugal - great food, culture, and more affordable!
